quote: Never say never. I was 300 pounds five years ago, and now I'm a world champion Iron Man athlete.
why_clipworthy: Inspires listeners with a story of personal transformation and resilience.
suggested_hook: From 300 pounds to Iron Man champion: Mary Ann Gillespie's incredible journey.

quote: Trust is built by relationships. If you have a transactional-based business, you're not going to succeed.
why_clipworthy: Challenges the conventional focus on transactions over relationships in real estate.
suggested_hook: Why your transactional business model might be holding you back.
